gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint Matthew
gospel.text:
[[Mt 9,27]]As Jesus passed by, two blind men followed him, crying out, “Son of David, have pity on us!”  
[[Mt 9,28]]When he entered the house, the blind men approached him and Jesus said to them, "Do you believe that I can do this?" "Yes, Lord," they said to him.
[[Mt 9,29]]Then he touched their eyes and said, "Let it be done for you according to your faith."
[[Mt 9,30]]And their eyes were opened. Jesus warned them sternly, "See that no one knows about this."
[[Mt 9,31]]But they went out and spread word of him through all that land.

psalm.text:
[[Ps 27,1]]The LORD is my light and my salvation; 
whom should I fear? 
The LORD is my life's refuge; 
of whom should I be afraid?

[[Ps 27,4]]One thing I ask of the LORD 
this I seek: 
to dwell in the house of the LORD 
all the days of my life, 
that I may gaze on the loveliness of the LORD 
and contemplate his temple.  

[[Ps 27,13]]I believe that I shall see the bounty of the LORD 
in the land of the living.
[[Ps 27,14]]Wait for the LORD with courage; 
be stouthearted, and wait for the LORD.

first_reading.title: Book of Isaiah
first_reading.text:
[[Is 29,17]]Thus says the Lord GOD: But a very little while, and Lebanon shall be changed into an orchard, and the orchard be regarded as a forest!
[[Is 29,18]]On that day the deaf shall hear the words of a book; And out of gloom and darkness, the eyes of the blind shall see.
[[Is 29,19]]The lowly will ever find joy in the LORD, and the poor rejoice in the Holy One of Israel.
[[Is 29,20]]For the tyrant will be no more and the arrogant will have gone; All who are alert to do evil will be cut off,
[[Is 29,21]]those whose mere word condemns a man, Who ensnare his defender at the gate, and leave the just man with an empty claim.
[[Is 29,22]]Therefore thus says the LORD, the God of the house of Jacob, who redeemed Abraham: Now Jacob shall have nothing to be ashamed of, nor shall his face grow pale.
[[Is 29,23]]When his children see the work of my hands in his midst, They shall keep my name holy; they shall reverence the Holy One of Jacob, and be in awe of the God of Israel.
[[Is 29,24]]Those who err in spirit shall acquire understanding, and those who find fault shall receive instruction.
